dmca.title: Re: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, February 19, 2006 3:02 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com;
charlesc-copyright-enforcement-theplanet.com@discworld.dyndns.org
Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Notice of copyright infringement
Date: Sat, 18 Feb 2006 10:20:24 -0600
From: Charles Cazabon
<charlesc-copyright-enforcement-theplanet.com@discworld.dyndns.org>
To: ThePlanet Abuse Desk <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: AboveNet Abuse <abuse@above.net>
References: <20060217145048.GA16074@discworld.dyndns.org>

Greetings,

I sent the following notice of copyright infringement to the abuse desk at
ThePlanet over 24 hours ago.  I have not had any response to my complaint
(not even an auto-ACK), and the infringing copy of my work is still being
served from 70.85.201.82/www.focusonthebeach.com in ThePlanet IP space.

I expect the infringing copy of my work to be removed immediately.  This
notice copied to your upstream in the hope that it will encourage promptness
in your response.

Charles Cazabon
<charlesc-copyright-enforcement-theplanet.com@discworld.dyndns.org> wrote:
> Greetings,
> 
> A user of the server at 70.85.201.82/www.focusonthebeach.com in 
> ThePlanet IP space is violating my copyright.  Here are the particulars:
> 
> > 1. A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act 
> > on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.
> 
> This message contains my electronic signature.  I am the exclusive 
> copyright holder of the work in question and therefore am authorized 
> to act in this matter.
> 
> > 2. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been 
> > infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site 
> > are covered by a single notification, a representative list of such
works at that site.
> 
> The particular copyrighted work is a photograph of a pet hamster.
> The original work is located on my website at the following URL:
> Page: http://pyropus.ca/personal/pets/zena/page-05.html
> Image: http://pyropus.ca/personal/pets/zena/zena-wheel1.jpg
> 
> > 3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing 
> > or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be 
> > removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information 
> > reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to locate the
material.
> 
> The infringing copy of my work is here:
> http://www.focusonthebeach.com/images/zena-wheel1.jpg
> 
> > 4. Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider 
> > to contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone 
> > number, and, if available, an electronic mail address at which the 
> > complaining party may be contacted.
> 
> Name, address, phone number:
> 
> Charles Cazabon
> 101 - 116 Research Drive
> Saskatoon, SK
> S7N 3R3
> (306) 382-4100 ext. 106
> 
> Email contact is preferred; you may reach me at this email address.
> 
> > 5. A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief 
> > that use of the material in the manner complained of is not 
> > authorized by the copyright owner, it's agent, or the law.
> 
> I have not authorized this use of my copyrighted work, and it is not 
> authorized by the law.  I thus have a good-faith belief that this is 
> an infringing copy of my copyrighted work.
> 
> > 6. A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, 
> > and under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is 
> > authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.
> 
> The information in this notification is accurate and made under 
> penalty of perjury.  I am the copyright holder of the work in 
> question, and therefore am authorized to act on my own behalf.
> 
> I trust this is sufficient for you to take action.  I would like the 
> infringing work removed immediately, and a statement that the user 
> will not be permitted to re-post the offending work to the server in
question.
> 
> Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.
> 
> Charles Cazabon
- --
- -----------------------------------------------------------------------
Charles Cazabon
<charlesc-copyright-enforcement-theplanet.com@discworld.dyndns.org>
- -----------------------------------------------------------------------


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

SrYZoA0QbmdyASTzWd9Jwtc=
=SdwU
